title: Shen Nerfs Will Make Q Max Feel Terrible
body: I understand why riot wants to nerf Shen's pushing power, but my problem is that the base damage they are adding to Q goes up with SHEN'S LEVEL (and only by five damage every THREE levels). If the base damage went up by rank in Q, it would still cut his damage versus minions by more than half (110 bonus damage at rank 5 currently, PBE damage caps out at 40) and Q max would still feel actually meaningful. Having the damage go up by Shen's level just makes putting points into Q feel worthless.

replies.body:
His Q's % health damage still ranks up like before. 

Q's new base damage component doesn't scale with rank because it is intended to add base line effectiveness for farming, not increased dueling power over the course of the lane phase which is already provided by his % health damage rank up.
Still doesn't make it feel impactful to put points into

Yeah, putting points into Q will make your empowered autos deal like 2-3 more damage to minions per rank. It's just really unsatisfying to put points into an ability that doesn't feel like it's getting any stronger at all.

The whole point of this nerfs is that Riot wants Shen to suck ass at killing minions because he doesn't pay the price other splitpushers do(not being able to join their team without burning a summoner spell). This way Shen's team is under pressure to make use of Stand United before Shen loses more(i.e. his tower falls) than Stand United can gain.

I know that they want to reduce shen's damage to minions. My point is that even if the base damage increased by rank in shen's q, it would still be a huge nerf to his pushing power. Right now shen gets +20 dmg to minions per rank. If riot implemented my idea, it would be +5 dmg to minions per rank. That's still a big drop in damage AND it would retain some of the impact from putting points in Q.
